description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by July 7, 2023 at 2:00pm EDT. All bids submitted after 2:00pm EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Summary: The Department of National Defence and the Canadian Armed Forces has a requirement for a standing offer for commercial electrical services.
full_summary:
# Commercial Electrical Services Tender Announcement
=============================================

### Tender Information

| Information | Detail |
|-------------|--------|
| Tender Title | Commercial Electrical Services |
| Reference Number | WS4046199598-Doc4046569975 |
| Amendment Number | 3 |
| Solicitation Number | WS4046199598 |
| Publication Date | 2023-06-15 |
| Tender Closing Date | 2023-07-07T14:00:00 EDT |
| Expected Contract Start Date | 2023-08-14 |
| Expected Contract End Date | 2027-08-13 |

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category**: Construction and Services (`CNST`)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (`CFTA`)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Not Applicable
* **Regions of Delivery**: Medicine Hat

### Contracting Entity

| Information | Detail |
|-------------|--------|
| Contracting Entity Name (English) | Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) |
| Contracting Entity Name (French) | Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC) |
| Contact Information | [For contact details and instructions on how to access the notice, click here.](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16596150?extsite=MTY1OTYxNTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) |

### Tender Description
The Department of National Defence and the Canadian Armed Forces requires a standing offer for commercial electrical services.

### Note on Tender Closing Date
Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 14:00 HNE on July 7, 2023.

Note that the original text contained a section with detailed address information for the contracting entity and the end-user entity. I have simplified this section to focus on the most essential details and included a generic link for those wishing to access additional information on the tender notice.

Best regards,
[Your Name]  # Re-written entry
N.B. I couldn't use the original entry formatting due to markdown limitations. I tried to keep your instructions in mind. Let me know if you'd like me to clarify any parts.  # Comment  Please make sure that you've
